title: SSL key logging (aka SSLKEYLOGFILE)
body: SSL key logging is a feature that browsers export TLS keys into a text file, which can be used by Wireshark to decrypt TLS traffic. This feature can be enabled on Firefox and Chrome by setting SSLKEYLOGFILE environment variable, which is a path to the log file.

comments.body: Is there a generic solution to hook into the schannel library that would also work for e.g. IIS ?
